review_title: Vast learning opportunities and international perspective
pros: Pact offers international travel opportunities, substantial benefits (e.g. insurance), online and offline learning possibilities, and extremely helpful, friendly and supporting team. However, keep in mind that country offices are very independent and therefore can have different atmosphere
cons: Once again, this depends on a country office and its management. From my experience in Ukraine, the major disadvantage was severe understaffing, which led to investing extra time in work to cope with all the tasks assigned. Micro-management was another issue; however, that is far from being a part of the corporate culture
